abstract: With a Friday deadline looming, communities around the country are rushing to get in their applications for a Google-financed, ultra-high-speed data network.
snippet: With a Friday deadline looming, communities around the country are rushing to get in their applications for a Google-financed, ultra-high-speed data network.
lead_paragraph: Update 10:45 p.m. Adding final count of communities expressing interest in the Google Fiber project.

headline.main: Cities Rush to Woo Google Broadband Before Friday Deadline
